AAO.caption: notification_title
AAO.doc: If you are using templated notifications, this field is not required.
AAO.name: notification_title

AAP.caption: recipient
AAP.doc: Select a user to send this notification to. If you want to send it to multiple users, use the multiple_recipients field instead.
AAP.name: recipient

ABO.caption: override
ABO.doc: Override object in JSON format. Read Engagespot REST API documentation to know more about override.
ABO.name: override

ABV.caption: multiple_recipients
ABV.doc: Sends the notification to a list of users.
ABV.name: multiple_recipients

ABW.caption: category
ABW.doc: Tag a category for this notification. Categories help your users set their notification preferences.
ABW.name: category

ABZ.caption: Template ID
ABZ.doc: To send templated notifications, enter the id of the template you created in Engagespot dashboard.
ABZ.name: template_id

ABa.caption: Data Attributes
ABa.doc: Any additional custom key-value pair attributes (in JSON format) that you want to send. This is useful to replace placeholders if you are sending templated notifications.
ABa.name: data

ABn.caption: Custom Data 1
ABn.doc: Pass any custom data that will be available on the clicked event state
ABn.name: bb_custom_data_1

ABo.caption: Custom Data 2
ABo.doc: Pass any custom data that will be available on the clicked event state
ABo.name: bb_custom_data_2
